name: calculate_expression
description: Evaluate a math expression and return the result.

name: http_client
description: Make HTTP requests (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE) to external APIs and websites.

url.description: The URL to make the request to. Must include protocol (http:// or https://)

method.description: HTTP method to use. Defaults to GET

headers.description: Additional headers to send with the request in string format. In key value pair object. Defaults to {} (empty object). Example is {'Content-Type':'application/json'}

body.description: Request body for POST/PUT requests. Can be a JSON object in a string format, Request body as a JSON object (will be automatically stringified). Defaults to {} (empty object)

timeout.description: Request timeout in milliseconds. Defaults to 10000 (10 seconds)
